title: I Need You
album: Pump Up the Healthy Love OST Part. 3
lyrics:
Lyric eunlo - I Need You

[Romanization]

Every time I think of you, all day and night
anywhere', anywhere'
Every time I think of you, even in dreams
anywhere', anywhere'

When I was lost, you held my hand
and now I want to be the light
In the dark

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us
dreaming of us
here together

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us here together
forever
I'll stay with you

every time I see you, stars light up the sky
anywhere', anywhere'

When I was lost, you found my way
And now I'll be your shining star
in your heart

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us
dreaming of us
here together

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us here together
forever
I'll stay with you

I'll always be with you
Even if you don't know how I feel about you
I'm waiting here for you

No matter what, I'll stay
I'll never let you go
And you will feel the love I give to you

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us
dreaming of us
here together

I'm dreaming of us
dreaming of us here together
forever

I'll stay with you
I'll always be with you

[Hangeul]

Every time I think of you, all day and night

anywhere', anywhere'

Every time I think of you, even in dreams

anywhere', anywhere'



When I was lost, you held my hand

and now I want to be the light

In the dark



I'm dreaming of us

dreaming of us

dreaming of us

here together



I'm dreaming of us

dreaming of us here together

forever

I'll stay with you



every time I see you, stars light up the sky

anywhere', anywhere'



When I was lost, you found my way

And now I'll be your shining star

in your heart



I'm dreaming of us

dreaming of us

dreaming of us

here together



I'm dreaming of us

forever

I'll stay with you



I'll always be with you

Even if you don't know how I feel about you

I'm waiting here for you



No matter what, I'll stay

I'll never let you go

And you will feel the love I give to you



I'm dreaming of us

dreaming of us

dreaming of us

here together



I'm dreaming of us

dreaming of us here together

forever



I'll stay with you

I'll always be with you
name: eunlo - I Need You
